instructions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1 to 1 1/2 inch chunks. Put onion mix in a plastic bag, add potato chunks and
shake until potatoes are coated with the onion mix. Empty potatoes into a shallow baking dish, drizzle with
olive oil and toss to coat. Bake for 30 minutes in a 425 F oven or until potatoes are tender and golden brown.
Roll potatoes once or twice during roasting. Serve with sour cream if desired. Serves 4. 
*(Rev. 11/5/93)*
name: Onion Roasted Potatoes
